interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.TargetSpinSpeedLevel
interface.description: This interface provides a capability to set target spin speed level

property.name: MaxLevel
property.description: Maximum value allowed for target spin speed level setting

property.name: TargetLevel
property.description: Target set-point value of spin speed level

property.name: SelectableLevels
property.description: List of the values of spin speed level which can be selected
